title: That One Rich Fan of Mine - Novel Updates
tags: Acting   Celebrities   Cute Protagonist   Doting Love Interests   e-Sports   Fated Lovers   Gamers   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Short Story   Siblings   Wealthy Characters
author: Custard pineapple bun   奶黃菠蘿包
description:
He tossed half a million yuan worth of super torpedoes by accident. 

Lin Xizhou, a ‘fresh meat’ celebrity with popularity the size of the sky, is a ‘masterful actor’ born in a performing arts family. He is the ‘Violet Star from the Heaven’ in the present entertainment circle. Not only is he talented and adaptable, he is also modest. One could even describe him as perfect. 

But no one knows that his dream was to become a professional esports player. 

Another thing that no one knows was that although he didn’t become a professional esports player, he unintentionally became the world’s number one ADC player’s boyfriend. >
